H

Hangman - Class in <Unnamed>
The hangman class allows to create a basic hangman game by generating a secret word from a predefined word list and uses other methods to guess the word.
Hangman() - Constructor for class Hangman
 
HangmanGame - Class in <Unnamed>
Main method creates an instance of the Hangman class and access it's methods in order to generate a hangman game.
HangmanGame() - Constructor for class HangmanGame
